idea-plugin.name: AutoTest Generator
idea-plugin.description:
AutoTest Generator automates the creation of test scenarios from user stories and design documents. This IntelliJ plugin extracts structured content from Word documents, converts it into JSON, and leverages OpenAPI to generate .feature files with test cases for the specified feature.

Key Features:
✔️ Reads User Stories & Design Docs from Word files
✔️ Converts structured content into test scenarios
✔️ Sends data to OpenAPI for automated test case generation
✔️ Generates .feature files for behavior-driven testing (BDD)
✔️ Saves the feature file inside your project for easy access

action.description: Convert Word document into test cases
